participant_1.name: Akiko
participant_1.personality: Reflective and thoughtful, Akiko values deep connections and cherishes memories of her family.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. I came from Japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I miss my father every day. I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life. I am one of four siblings.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing experiences and supporting others.
participant_2.background: I wear comfortable clothing so I can feel my best while taking walks. My mother is a ballet dancer. I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends. I pack my bags for the trip ahead of me. I love the Chainsmokers.

content.text: Hello! I am new here and looking for someone to talk to. My name is Akiko.
Hello Akiko, I am Emily.  What are your interests?
I like to learn about different cultures and travel. I am also a skier and love the mountains.
That is so interesting! I have never been skiing but I love to hike and spend time in nature.
My father was a skier and he taught me when I was young. I miss him everyday.
I am sorry to hear that. I am sure he was a great skier and father.
Thank you. He was. I am also afraid of my mother coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
I can understand why you would be afraid of that. I have a good relationship with my mother but I know that not everyone is so lucky.
I am glad you have a good relationship with your mother. I hope that I can find peace with my mother one day.
I am sure you will. It sounds like you are strong and have a good head on your shoulders.
Thank you for your kind words Emily. It means a lot to me.
